job_history.work_description: Responsible for the forecasting, planning and reporting of Merck Capital Investments in support of all divisional areas. Harmonize and streamline capital project tracking and approval procedures. Led a total team of 12 professionals, having both Finance and Engineering backgrounds.

Responsible for the development of budgets, forecasts, long range plans, inventory & capital reporting for all manufacturing plants in North America. Oversaw a '14 budget that delivered 10% labor & overhead standard cost productivity. Developed a clear, highly collaborative budget COGS review process with MCC Finance to ensure transparency and integrity in the MCC-specific productivity handoff. Led a total team of 18 professionals, spanning the US, Puerto Rico and Canada.

Oversaw the development of the annual budget, quarterly forecasts for the Biologics Commercialization area. Analyze financial variances & performance trends and communicate issues to the VP, Biologics Mfg and Exec Director, BMSC. Provide financial & economic analysis to support strategic decisions for Merck's biologics programs.

Oversaw the development of the MMD annual budget, quarterly forecasts. Analyze financial variances & performance trends and communicate divisional issues to the President, Merck Manufacturing and his direct reports. Established process and tools required for the MMD 5-yr long range operating plan.

Implemented standard financial reporting processes & procedures for the Merck Manufacturing Division. Provided regional financial support to the North American & Latin American plants for the annual budget and quarterly forecasts.
Prepared the annual budgets and numerous scenario analyses for the Cordis Neurovascular US Sales & WW Marketing groups. Performed budget variance analyses to understand drivers of spending change.

Prepared the annual budgets for the West Point Quality Organization and Vaccine Tech & Engineering group. Revised monthly financial forecasts based on changes in business drivers, performed variance analysis & presented financial performance metrics to WPQO and VTE Vice-Presidents and their direct reports monthly.
Evaluated the adequacy and effectiveness of Merck's internal control environment through identifying significant business risks and conducting detailed testing of critical business processes.
